mapper.insert: insert into rev_chan (num,writer,subject,password,ref,re_step,re_level ,content,ip,filename,filesize) values ( (select nvl(max(num)+1,1) from rev_chan) ,#{writer},#{subject},#{password} ,(select nvl(max(num)+1,1) from rev_chan) ,1,0,#{content},#{ip},#{filename},#{filesize} )
mapper.select: select *from(select A.*, rownum as rn from ( select num,writer,subject,reg_date,readcount ,filename,filesize,down,re_level ,(select count(*) from chanrev_comment where board_num=num) comment_count, show from rev_chan where subject like #{search_option} and show='y' order by ref desc, re_step )A ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update rev_chan set readcount=readcount+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select password from rev_chan where num=#{num} and password=#{password}
mapper.insert: insert into chanrev_comment (comment_num,board_num,writer,content) values ((select nvl(max(comment_num)+1,1) from chanrev_comment) , #{board_num}, #{writer}, #{content})

insert into rev_chan (num,writer,subject,password,ref,re_step,re_level ,content,ip,filename,filesize) values ( (select nvl(max(num)+1,1) from rev_chan) ,#{writer},#{subject},#{password} ,#{ref},#{re_step},#{re_level} ,#{content},#{ip},#{filename},#{filesize} )
mapper.update: update rev_chan set down=down+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from rev_chan where subject=#{search_option}
